TextView.android:text:
• Daily swings are limited, but users can earn additional swings per day for consistent logging.

• Expense entries must be at least R20.

• Logged expenses must come from different wallets.

• Each rock requires a specific number of swings to break:
 - Common: 10 swings
 - Rare: 20 swings
 - Legendary: 30+ swings

• After breaking their first rock, the user unlocks a random new rock.

• Staying below your minimum budget limit increases the chance of getting a Legendary rock and increases reward quality.

• Staying within your budget limit increases the chance of getting a Rare rock and increases reward quality.

• Buffs can include temporary multipliers (e.g., next 3 days: +5 swings per day, increased damage), or streak protection.
